channel.title: Mandrieu on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mandrieu on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Resilient PHP applications
item.description: No matter how well designed is your project and how many tests you have, at some point your website can become inaccessible.

item.title: Make modules on the back office great again!
item.description: Since the release of 1.7.0, we are working hard on improving the way developers can customize and enhancing the quality of PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestonBot has reached stable version
item.description: Some weeks ago, we welcomed a new team member in the core team: Preston(Bot)!

item.title: Introducing PrestonBot
item.description: Some of you may have noticed that a few weeks ago, we have a new team member in the core team: Preston!

item.title: Here comes PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4!
item.description: Three weeks ago we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3. Since then, and with the help of the community, we’ve been working on it to fix the bugs you’ve reported and to keep improving this new version. We’re now releasing PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4 version, so we can keep gathering feedback and make sure that the final and stable version will be the best it can be!
